Review Text: Ordered egg and chive grilled sandwich, I'm satisfied for the taste against the price. Very well packed. Came in a nice small box. Would love to order again.

We ordered Dollar burger and pound burger.. Pound burger had Cottage cheese with very spicy coating.. Dollar burger has aloo party which tasted good .. the fillings other than the party were same for both the burgers i.e., a leaf of lettuce , some mayo which was stuffed in a very dry bun.. the bun took away any remaining goodness of the burger .. would not recommend, there are definitely better burger places in Hyderabad

I don't normally write reviews but this place is a gem. üëÖ
I ordered the grilled chicken sandwich, and it's one of the better sub style sandwiches that I've had. It's fresh, plentiful and cheap ( relative a certain brand that rhymes with hubway ). Would recommend as a healthy snack.
Ordered veg Arribiata pasta from here and it was delicious. They delivered the food on time and packaging was superb. Delivery boy was polite and professional. Will be ordering soon.
Ordered a dollar burger from here and after that I am in love with this restaurant. Burger was very well packed and delivered. It was super tasty and worth the money. Superb experience.

Ordered white sauce pasta from here and I must say this was one of the best pasta I ever had. First it comes in a perfect packaging. About quality and quantity it eas5 perfect. Completely worth the price. Will definitely order again.

Recently, I ordered Chicken Banh Mi Sandwich from here. Packaging was excellent and grilled chicken quantity was decent enough.¬†In fact, flavor was amazing with fresh veggie and coriander leaves. Will soon try other sandwiches and burger for sure.¬†Keep up the good work and keep on adding new items.

Tried different types of burgers and shakes from this restaurant and what the restaurant tried is actually successful and really amazing. One should try this restaurant and that will make you its regular customer
Amazing food! Must try all the things. There desserts are also amazing and very justified to the prices. Burgers have become favourites to me.

I have ordered (Veg daliya Kichidi) from Healthie(swiggy). I have received from Foreign caf√© and they claim that they have different names. Very unhygienic food and found foreign particle(COCROACH) in kichidi. Can't imagine these kind of things. Till date I didn't know veg daliya kichidi means including cockroaches as well....don't have the option to give -ve rating. Usually I don't give reviews even the food quality is bad but this is unimaginable...‚Ä¶

I had ordered for the white sauce veg pasta from this place few days back and this place does justice to a pasta. Sauce was yum and pasta was Al dente. Surprising for a delivery only place. These guys did it.

Great place to order food online.... Stumbled upon this place in search of a good burger ND pasta place.... And it was a great find..... Loved the packaging and food was tasty... Would recommend this to everyone
I tried their¬†Chicken and Mushroom pasta and the chicken sandwich.¬†It was very¬†well packed and delivery was just in time.Really happy with the food, can't wait to try other dishes from here.

They have some of the best sandwiches.
Love the taste! They delivered well before the time and packing was superb.
Keep it up guys... Will be ordering soon
Order Veg.Arabiatta pasta. The taste was good and right amount of spice and veggies. The packing was good. Enjoyed the food.  Excited to try other Veg. Menus

Happiness is having good pasta and coffee to pamper yourself and the experience was super good.
Will recommend to others as well. My food was served hot and was tasty enough. The like the quantity also was good enough for 1 person.
Just love the Pastas they deliver. They are my all time favorite. Alfredo pasta and Veg Burger are my favorite üòç perfect food, perfect packaging. Just love the experience.

We have ordered¬†Korean Mushroom Bowl and Szechuan Chicken with Fried Rice, I enjoyed having both dishes. It was tasty and yummy meal. Packaging was very good. Must try the food from this restro #FoodLover

I am somebody who loves to try out new things and explore as much as possible.
So recently I got a chance to order from them. I had falafel burger
The taste was lovely. It was extremely delicious.
Packaging was nice. Extra points for that.
I ordered Veg Cottage cheese burger which came in a perfect packaging. Pasta was served hot and one bite of it actually made my day. Must try. Will definitely recommend to my friends as well.

Hated when the pasta tastes bad. But I first time tried placing the order with them and found this to be the best to make my day Happy. I loved it. Thanks to my friend who made me try this. Please come up with more options.
packing was great..expensive products and food quality was seriously not upto the mark..I ordered cheese burger and received it totally cold.Not satisfied with the quality..

I ordered one cottage cheese sandwich and a dollar burger, both were amazing. Can‚Äôt wait to have it again. The burger was amazing....
The delivery was also on time....

The rosemary chicken said with spinach pilaf. But not sure why I didnt receive it. I got 2 pieces of chicken that were sinking in sauce. Dont know if the description is incorrect or the food that was delivered. Pictures attached for reference. Taste was fine. Found a bug in the container..!!

their seashell chicken pasta and chicken pink pasta are really amazing¬†
one must try these for the authentic and great taste¬†
pasta has a really good texture its really tempting¬†
overall a good experience

Ordered online.the packing was good.
We ordered from innerchef but got the package from foreign cafe. When we asked they said that had different names.
We ordered 2 pound burgers. They are worst.
They had lettuse, chicken and mayonise stuffing.
The worst burger i ever had, its hard to chew and the chicken patty was really worst.
Chicken pesto pasta and chicken aglio olio pasta had fresh chicken and good amount of broccoli and olives but the spaghetti didn‚Äôt taste like one. Aglio olio was too oily also.

I had ordered the Szechuan Prawn with Fried Rice. Along with a Green Mint Cooler!
It had great taste and the prawns were cooked just right! Green mint cooler was a nice refreshing drink .
Amazing packaging like always, delivery was fine too

I sure was missing a good place for pasta home delivery, but Foreign cafe more than makes up for it.
A must try would be their Parma Rosa pasta, go ahead and be sure to try!

Ordered a burrito bowl which turned out to be plain steamed vegetables and plain brown rice with nothing else to eat it with - no salsa or cream as mentioned in the menu. How is that a burrito bowl? If I order rajma Chawal are you going to send me boiled rajma and boiled rice without any gravy? Very disappointing..
Very gud an fast delivery
It was ok. I had banh MI before. Tastes nothing like this.

Ordered the monster chicken burger, 400ml caramel coffee, n himalayan ice tea @ 685 rupees. The burger was decent, bigger than a burger King whopper at 6-7 inches but three cold stale patties. loved the bun n the pickles. The coffee was terrible without caramel. Didn't stop them from sending it through anyway. Was sooo looking forward to having caramel coffee but looks like they ran out of caramel n whipped cream. Still had to pay 250 bucks for it. Ice tea was dumped down the drain. I received nothing fresh in the morning. Cant say anything about other times.
TLDR: worth trying once, you will not try it the second time
super serive
Took more than hour. Almost 2 hours to deliver food.
Dry burger and really bad juice

I had ordered the sandwiches, pastas and shakes for a get together. The food was very carefully packed and delivered right on time. It was very fresh and yummy. All my guests were craving for more food even though our stomachs were full. Surely going to order again from this place. The shakes were the best out of the order!

I came to Hyderabad for a meeting and this was one of the places who was open till night and the menu looked brilliant. I wanted to order just a burger but ended up buying a green card potato burger. Loved each and everything that came and the green mint cooler as zomato treats was also delicious.
I have recently shifted to this city. I ordered from foreign cafe after a recommendation from a friend. The food was very nice! The pastas were yummy. The cold coffee was the best I‚Äôve ever had!
Last night I ordered Veg Burrito bowl. Starting from Delivery, it was on time. Packaging was awesome in fact WOW. Veggies were fresh. Will place an order soon..or will go for subscription (if any).
I ordered one uncle tom's maggie and a cottage cheese banh mi sandwich which was very delicious...packaging was very impressive as well as delivery...must try..

Don‚Äôt know why this outlet has a bad rating? Maybe coz of the deliveries? Idk ü§≠
I was in Hyderabad recently (visiting a friend) and was craving burgers so ordered from this place via Swiggy (to be safe). Sorry Zomato! ü§™
I ordered 2 chicken burgers - California chicken and banh mi chicken. And I was really impressed with the burgers. Buns were very soft and the sauces inside tasted unlike anything I have ever tasted in a burger. The size was also perfect.
Food and Packing deserves a 5/5.Delivery was taken care of by Swiggy so no complaints there as well!
Next time I ordered their sandwiches and they were good too! Good Luck to the people operating this outlet. May your ratings reflect the true potential of the Burgers! üòÅ
I ordered a veg sandwich and a shake, which were very tasty and fresh. Delivery was also on time. Can't wait to order again.......Must try it....
one ordered delivered wrong

Something different in Hyderabad, had ordered chicken Parma rosa pasta and a New York caramel shake, and it tasted delicious, the pink sauce looked kinda cute with the pasta, the consistency was good and the shake was too heavy, just too good.

Had gone to a friends house for party and the food was from foreign Cafe, had no idea about this cafe till I tasted the food it was very filling in very tasty and I will surely make my next purchase from you
#burger and they got it right....my bff told me And I love her more now... I had this amazing pound burger and man I was blown away!!!.......
Very less chicken in pasta and sandwich have spoiled tomatoes

Ordered from this place when I was visiting a couple of friends in Hyderabad. Really enjoyed the coffee caramel shake (good hit of coffee). That alone took the cake! Apart from that, we had Maggi and sandwiches - both pretty yummy. Got to know they've a branch in Gurgaon as well - will be ordering from there soon!

it is a pocket friendly Caf√®
serves a real good food
You can have one of the tastiest pasta here.
A must try place in gachibowli locality.
good ambience
awesome cake
Pasta is nice but refreshing mint was nonsense

The shake was stated as 450 ml but received that in a 200 ml bottle in addition of it being hot. The delivery was also late.
Thanks for following up on review and resending the shake. Updating the rating.
They need to increase the quantity of food for the price they are charging.
good food

so worse restaurant ever. whey zomato took this restaurant. they don't know how to cook also. I think they are doing experiment.
Price is so high. quality and quantity is worse. they are thinking to earn money in less time. and they will take more than 1 hour for delivery.
I ordered 3 times from this restaurant and every time experience is bad.
NEVER ORDER FORM THIS RESTAURANT.
very bad

Had food from here quite a few times as this place delivers to work at Nankaramguda.
The choice of food is great and delivery times good as well.
Liked the Sandwiches, Burgers and the fired rice as well
All in all, will order food from here again.
delivery at 5g speed

Giving a rating of 1.0 because it is the least. I have placed an order and have not recieved it even after 2.5 hours. The contact number of the restaurant and the toll free numbers of zomato are inactive. After putting up the inquiry through the website, I have received the call twice from the customer care asking for more 15-20 mins time to deliver the product. This is nothing but making a joke of your customer. If there is no delivery executive?¬† cancel the order immediately and refund.
not worth it
Food was absolutely horrible. Please do yourself a favour and don't order from here
ordered pasta and it's tasty, however it took nearly 90 mins for the delivery which I am not happy about.
Worst pasta I have ever had. By the way I ordered chicken Alfredo pasta.
Most Pathetic service
order received after 3 hrs
money went and we didn't recieve the order.

took more than 1 hour for delivery. The order is no where near to the expectations they set. half empty and thin af. this place is dead to me.

I ordered for chicken Arabita pasta which is superb pasia vasool taste & quantity
I have never had a pasta before like Foreign Cafe served me I just fallen love with foreign cafe yummy & creamy Pasta
I can see foreign cafe is a fast growing online food delivery¬†

it's takes 2.5 hours to deliver.¬†

worth the price for sandwich which is different from traditional sandwich .¬†Pudding quantity is good but the taste would have been little better .¬†A good place if you want to have something different from traditional items
